description:
This Course will teach you the following:

How to easily start your own online coaching business with hardly any cash. The goal and objective is to provide you with the information you need to start your own coaching business, virtually overnight, for less than $50 (US) in start-up capital.

How to offer "live" videoconferencing coaching sessions. The goal and objective is to provide you with information on a unique videoconferencing platform that will set you apart from your competition and help establish you as a coaching expert in your field. You will see examples of the videoconferencing platform throughout the course.

How to get a low cost marketing platform. The goal and objective is to provide you with information on how to establish and promote your own coaching business without incurring the time and expense required to build a custom website

How to get a Low cost merchant account to collect money from your clients. The goal and objective is to provide you with information on how you can set up a merchant account to collect money from your clients at little or no cost.

At the end of the course, you will have the information you will need to start your own online coaching business, virtually overnight, for very little cash.


Hi, I'm Gary Rogers. I own my own online coaching business and I'd like to teach you how to start your own online coaching business using the same exact tools and techniques I use in my business. All you need is a computer, a webcam and a broadband internet connection.

I'll show you how to coach your clients using a unique videoconferencing platform; how to get a marketing platform and how to get a merchant account, allowing you to collect payments from your clients......all for under $50 US dollars per month in total overhead!

If you have knowledge, expertise or skills you would like to teach to other people......this course is for you!

Important information regarding this course:

  • The introductory price will increase shortly.
  • You have unlimited lifetime access at no extra costs, whatsoever
  • All future additional lectures, bonuses, etc. in the course are always free.
  • You have an unconditional 30 day money-back-in-full guarantee.
  • You have my on-going support whenever you have a question.
title: The Best Way To Succeed As An Online Coach
